mealPlanOptions.title: Daily Meal Plan
mealPlanOptions.description: Complete day optimized for your goals
mealPlanOptions.basePrompt: Create a complete daily meal plan with {calories} calories and {protein}g protein. I'm a {age}-year-old vegetarian climber weighing {currentWeight}lbs, trying to {goalDescription} {targetWeight}lbs.

mealPlanOptions.title: Pre/Post Workout Meals
mealPlanOptions.basePrompt: Design pre and post-workout meals for a {currentWeight}lb vegetarian climber. Pre-workout should fuel a climbing session, post-workout should optimize recovery with {postWorkoutProtein}g protein.

mealPlanOptions.title: High-Protein Strategy
mealPlanOptions.description: Meet protein goals efficiently as a vegetarian
mealPlanOptions.basePrompt: I need to hit {protein}g protein daily as a vegetarian climber. My current struggle is protein intake. Create a strategic meal plan using the most protein-efficient vegetarian foods.

mealPlanOptions.title: Weight Loss Focus
mealPlanOptions.description: Cut to climbing weight while maintaining strength
mealPlanOptions.basePrompt: Help me lose {weightToLose}lbs while maintaining climbing strength. Create a meal plan with {calories} calories that keeps me full and energized.

mealPlanOptions.title: Meal Prep Strategy
mealPlanOptions.description: Batch cooking for busy climbing schedule
mealPlanOptions.basePrompt: Design a weekly meal prep strategy for a busy climber training 15+ hours per week. I need {calories} calories and {protein}g protein daily as a vegetarian.

planning.name: Meal Planning
planning.description: Overall meal structure and daily planning

performance.name: Performance Nutrition
performance.description: Nutrition timing around training and climbing

macros.name: Macronutrient Focus
macros.description: Specific focus on protein, carbs, or fats

goals.name: Goal-Specific
goals.description: Nutrition plans tailored to specific body composition goals
